title: Heartland Flyer Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Heartland Flyer
top_text:
The Heartland Flyer runs from Fort Worth to Oklahoma City.
It connects with both directions of the Texas Eagle at Fort Worth.
Amtrak Thruway Bus service operated by BeeLine Express connects from Oklahoma City to Wichita,
and to Newton, where it connects with both directions of the Southwest Chief. It will wait for late trains at Newton.
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at Oklahoma City by the Oklahoma City Streetcar,
at Fort Worth by Trinity Railway Express,
and at Fort Worth by TEXRail.
